galla adhikarana nithignyayanta anuwa galla mahadhikaranaye pamanak ohu sewaya kala keti kalaya thula aparadha nadu 400kata aasanna pramanayak awasan kara thibe. 2017 marthu 28 wanida adhikarana sewa komisamata ha agawinisuruwarayata likhitha paminillak idiripath kara athi nithignya lal shantha danwa aththe balapitiya adhikaranaye di chuditha winisuruwaraya wisin wasara dekak thula nadu 800kata aasanna pramanayak awasan kara athi bawayi.

oba wisin mita pera mebandu wu nuwanathi bhikshuhuge piliwelin hangim nathi wimehi samapaththiyak asuweda´´yi wichala seka. ´´swamini, noasuwemi.´´ ´´swamini, bhagyawathun wahanse ekama aakinynyananychayathana hangim athuren kelawarata giya hangima yayi yam hangim panawana sekda, nohoth wenath samapaththinhi boho wu mudun pamini hangim panawanasekda´´yi asuweya. ´´pottapadaya, mama mudun pamini hangim ekak da panawami boho wu mudun pamini hangim da panawamiyi´´ wadala seka. ´´swamini, bhagyawath theme kese eya panawana sekdayi´´ asuweya. ´´pottapadaya, pruthiwi kasinadin athuren yam yam kasinayakin ho prathama dhyanadin athuren yam yam dhyanayakin ho chiththa chaithasikayange nawathimata pamine da, ee ee kasinayakin ho ee ee dhyanayakinmama mudun pamini hangim panawami.

mudal kollakamen anathuruwa kollakaruwan miris kudu praharayak owun wetha ella kara athi bawada polisiya kiyayi.pereda (16) rathri wyaparikaya mathpan hala wasa thawath thidenaku samaga kab rathayen niwasata yana gamanedi siya munuburata kiri pakattuwak dima sandaha kuda uduwa puthuge niwasa idiripita kab rathaya nathara kirimath samaga ee asalata yathuru padiyakin pamini kalupata hadagath dedenaku mudal illa tharjanaya kara ahasata wedi thaba mema mudal adangu bag deka paharagena gos athi bawa polisiya kiyayi.pamini kollakaruwan mudal bag deka laba dun pudgalayata hara anek thidena wetha miris kudu praharaya ella kara athi bawa polisiya kiyayi.
